name: Space Bomber (Cavani Nicolas, leptiphoenix, M5Altair, Floflo128, RobinGalmiche)
name_original: Space Bomber (Cavani Nicolas, leptiphoenix, M5Altair, Floflo128, RobinGalmiche)
description:
Bomberman like game in space.

Game made in 48 hours in order for us devs from UQAC, to know each other better and work together to prepare Ubisoft 2022 game development competition.

Credits :

  • Bensiali Adrien
  • Cavani Nicolas
  • Deniau Loïs
  • Galmiche Robin
  • Minot Eva
  • Miras Lucas
  • Ségalen Florent
  • Vinet Guillaume
